price: Аларды ушул дүйнөдө да, Кыяматта да наалат коштоп жүрөт. Кандай гана жаман кошулуу!
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati bi'sa al-rif'du al-marfūdu
